description:
Smart. Focused. Email.

Fast, cross-platform email designed to filter out the noise - so you can focus on what's important.
We’re excited to introduce +AI Translate!
+AI Translate helps you break language barriers by translating emails seamlessly within Spark—no copy-pasting or app-switching.
- Translate incoming emails: Detect and translate messages in other languages with easy reversion.
- Translate outgoing emails: Draft emails in your language and translate them for recipients instantly.
Upgrade to Spark Premium to start using +AI Translate today!
Have questions? Contact us at support@sparkmailapp.com.
